description: Triangle of rooted planar maps, read by rows.
references: W. G. Brown, Enumeration of non-separable planar maps, Canad. J. Math., 15 (1963), 526-545.
links: W. G. Brown, Enumeration of non-separable planar maps [Annotated scanned copy]
maple: T := proc(n, k) if k<=n then k*sum((2*j-k+1)*(j-1)!*(3*n-k-j)!/(j-k+1)!/(j-k)!/(2*k-j-1)!/(n-j)!, j=k..min(n, 2*k-1))/(2*n-k+1)! else 0 fi end: seq(seq(T(n, n-k+1), k=1..n), n=1..11); - Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Mar 30 2008
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := If[k <= n, k*Sum[(2*j-k+1)*(j-1)!*(3*n-k-j)!/(j-k+1)!/(j-k)!/(2*k-j-1)!/(n-j)!, {j, k, Min[n, 2*k-1]}]/(2*n-k+1)!, 0]; Table[t[n, k], {n, 1, 11}, {k, n, 1, -1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jan 20 2014, after Herman Jamke *)
crossrefs: A091665 is the same triangle with rows reversed and has much more information.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Mar 30 2008
